name: Crazy Ball (itch) (Flying Lightpanda)
description:
This game isn't very good because it's my first ever game.

Sorry it only works on mac, I cant figure out how to get more than the mac file.

Also, I couldn't figure out how to make an icon for it.

Instructions:
Use the arrow keys to move, and press r to restart. Also try not to fall into the lava and also there's and ending but not like a secret room or anything.
